description:
pep8 not running on api/openstack/common.py because 
our exclude rule is exclude =  .venv,.git,.tox,dist,doc,*openstack/common*,*lib/python*,*egg,build,tools/xenserver*
title: pep8 check not on api/openstack/common.py

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/226516
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=eef23489ee89ba775ced22ab39a737d88fd8f46c
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit eef23489ee89ba775ced22ab39a737d88fd8f46c
Author: jichenjc <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat Sep 19 22:58:14 2015 +0800

    Pep8 didn't check api/openstack/common.py
    
    flake8 rule in tox.ini has following
    exclude rule is exclude = .venv,.git,.tox,dist,doc,*openstack/common*
    which excludes api/openstack/common.py
    
    Change-Id: I39b82cf90048970e7bfc6be77de2e1543130f81b
    Closes-Bug: 1498634
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
